name: elm-bootstrap-starter-demo
description: A website to demonstrate Master View Types in Elm
author: Cedd Burge

scripts.postinstall: npm run globalinstall -g && npm run elminstall
scripts.globalinstall: npm install -g elm && npm install create-elm-app -g -f
scripts.netlifybuild: npm run globalinstall && npm run elminstall && npm run build
